object.name: country_factsheet
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="country" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title>Country</title> <vocabulary>wise_countries_vocabulary</vocabulary> </field> <field name="marine_water_per_country" type="zope.schema.Float"> <description>Percentage of marine water per country. Only input the number</description> <required>False</required> <title>Marine water per country</title> </field> <field name="marine_water_per_capita" type="zope.schema.Float"> <description>Quantity of marine water per capita. Only introduce the number.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Marine water per capita</title> </field> <field name="basemap_layer" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Basemap layer</title> <vocabulary>wise_basemap_layers</vocabulary> </field> </schema> </model>
